name: Airplane 3D Game
description:
Hello there!

This game is a small project to study Unity 3D and the physics inside the game. I'm working  and studying but I'll try to improve this game whenever I can.

You can see the progress of this game and others on my instagram or check the scripts or give ideas on GitHub.

Airplane simulation

Right now the game is pretty basic, I only did the movement mechanics but I still need to adjust the values. I also need to choose the best ForceMode to rotate de Airplane.

I'll look for sprites on the Assets Store but if you have onde or want to do art for this game just contact me.

Thank you!

If you liked this game go to my personal page on itch.io and check my work. thanks for playing. Please, give me your feedback and comment.
